entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:25 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Bella Airport 08:44 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except northeast 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys this morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to snow mixed with rain near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
